      Identifiers build() 
      Identifiers.Builder withConnection(Connection connection)
      Constructs a list of database object identifiers from SQL 2003 keywords, and from the database server.
      Identifiers.Builder withConnectionIfPossible(Connection connection)
      Tries to use the connection, but does not throw any exceptions.
      Identifiers.Builder withIdentifierQuoteString(String identifierQuoteString)
      Uses the string used to quote database object identifiers as provided.
      Identifiers.Builder withIdentifierQuotingStrategy(IdentifierQuotingStrategy identifierQuotingStrategy)
      Specifies how to quote database object identifiers.

      • withConnection

        public Identifiers.Builder withConnection(Connection connection)
                                   throws SQLException
        Constructs a list of database object identifiers from SQL 2003 keywords, and from the database server. Also obtains the identifier quote string from the database server.
        Parameters:
        connection - Live database connection
        Returns:
        Builder
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • withConnectionIfPossible

        public Identifiers.Builder withConnectionIfPossible(Connection connection)
        Tries to use the connection, but does not throw any exceptions.
        Parameters:
        connection - Live database connection
        Returns:
        Builder
        See Also:
        withConnection(Connection connection)

      • withIdentifierQuoteString

        public Identifiers.Builder withIdentifierQuoteString(String identifierQuoteString)
        Uses the string used to quote database object identifiers as provided.
        Parameters:
        identifierQuoteString - Identifier quote string override, or null if not overridden
        Returns:
        Builder

      • withIdentifierQuotingStrategy

        public Identifiers.Builder withIdentifierQuotingStrategy(IdentifierQuotingStrategy identifierQuotingStrategy)
        Specifies how to quote database object identifiers.
        Parameters:
        identifierQuotingStrategy - Set identifier quoting strategy, or turn off quoting if null
        Returns:
        Builder
